Package src

Class MenuItems

java.lang.Object
src.MenuItems
Direct Known Subclasses:
SetPackage
public class MenuItems extends Object
Shows the details of different item in the menu. An order can have many items.

    • MenuItems

      public MenuItems​(String itemID, String Name, String Type, float Price, String Description)
      Creates a new item in menu.
      Parameters:
      itemID - This item's ID. Item ID should be unique.
      Name - This item's name.
      Type - This item's type.
      Price - This item's price.
      Description - This item's description.

      This item's full name.

    • setName

      public void setName​(String Name)
      Changes the name of the item. Needs to update in menu to prevent confusion for customer.
      Parameters:
      Name - This item's name . Should not be the same name as before.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of this item in the menu.
      Returns:
      This item's type.

    • setType

      public void setType​(String Type)
      Changes the type of this item.
      Parameters:
      Type - This item's type.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the specific description of the item. Prevents allergic reaction for customer.
      Returns:
      This item's detailed description.

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription​(String Description)
      Changes the item's description. This might be due to change in ingredient/cooking method.
      Parameters:
      Description - This item's description. Includes possible allergies.

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice​(float Price)
      Changes the price of the item. Changes customer preference and total revenue.
      Parameters:
      Price - This item's price.
